title: VR-Based Basic Life Support (BLS) Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Concepts of Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) Awareness
context.additional_context: VR simulation-enhanced BLS skills training in environments with limited in-person instruction.

learning_goals: Learners can perform chest compression-to-breath cycles (30:2) with over 80% accuracy during a 10-minute BLS simulation in a VR environment
Learners can reduce no-flow time (time without blood flow) by over 10% through real emergency scenario evaluations
Learners can rate self-efficacy (confidence) at 4.0 or higher on a 5-point scale in post-VR training survey assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
